trans-unit.source: Creates and maintains the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore" /> sub-element of the service behaviors section of a Sql workflow configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 创建和维护 Sql 工作流配置文件的服务行为部分中的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore" /> 子元素。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Configuration.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Configuration.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior" /> 对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: A type object.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the connection string to the database server.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指向数据库服务器的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains information about the connection to the instance store database.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含有关至实例存储区数据库的连接的信息。

trans-unit.source: Examples of connection string contents include provider, data source, instance store database, and integrated security information.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串内容的示例包含提供程序、数据源、实例存储区数据库和集成安全信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a named connection string to the database server.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指向数据库服务器的已命名连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string name that represents a connection to a database server.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示指向数据库服务器的连接的字符串名称。

trans-unit.source: An example of a named connection string is "DefaultConnectionString".
trans-unit.target: 已命名的连接字符串的示例为"DefaultConnectionString"。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior" /> that contains property settings for a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Configuration.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior" /> 的属性设置的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Configuration.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement" /> 类型的新对象。

trans-unit.source: An generic object that contains workflow configuration element property settings.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含工作流配置元素属性设置的泛型对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time period in which the host must renew the lock on an instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个主机必须续订对某个实例的锁定的时间段。

trans-unit.source: A timespan object that represents the lock renewal period.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示锁定续订期间的 timespan 对象。

trans-unit.source: If the host does not renew the lock in the specified time period, the instance is unlocked and may be picked up by another host.
trans-unit.target: 如果宿主没有在指定的时间段内续订锁定，则会解除锁定此实例，并且另一宿主可能会选取此实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether workflow instance data is kept in the persistence store after the workflow instance completes or if it is deleted at that point.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流实例完成之后或如果该工作流实例在此时被删除，获取或设置此工作流实例数据是否保留在永久性存储中。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration of the actions that can occur when an instance completes.
trans-unit.target: 在某个实例完成后可能出现的一个操作枚举。

trans-unit.source: The enumerated actions consist of deleting the instance data from the persistence store or not deleting the instance data from the persistence store, when the instance has completed its operation.
trans-unit.target: 枚举的操作包括在实例完成其操作后删除持久性存储区中的实例数据或不删除持久性存储区中的实例数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the optional property that specifies how compression is used for instance data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个可指定如何对实例数据使用压缩的可选属性。

trans-unit.source: An option that determines the manner in which data compression is performed, if at all.
trans-unit.target: 一个选项，确定进行数据压缩所采用的方式（如果确实进行压缩）。

trans-unit.source: Possible values for this property are "None", which specifies no compression, and "GZip", which specifies that instance data is compressed and uses the gzip algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的可能值为"None"，它指定无压缩和"GZip"，指定该实例数据进行压缩，并使用 gzip 算法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the action that occurs in response to an exception that is thrown when a workflow instance is locked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为响应在锁定工作流实例时引发的异常而出现的操作。

trans-unit.source: An action response to an exception thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一个对所引发异常的操作响应。

trans-unit.source: Examples of the resulting <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Configuration.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement.InstanceLockedExceptionAction%2A> responses can include graceful shutdown and overlapped recycling of app domains, as well as failover and recovery from host failures.
trans-unit.target: 得到的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Configuration.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement.InstanceLockedExceptionAction%2A> 响应的示例包括正常关机和应用程序域的重叠回收以及故障转移和主机故障恢复。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of SQL connection retries.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置最大 SQL 连接重试次数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 4.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 4。

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the maximum number of SQL connection retries.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示最大 SQL 连接重试次数的整数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="P:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the time period after which the SQL Workflow Instance Store runs a detection task to detect any runnable or activatable workflow instances in the persistence database after the previous detection cycle.
trans-unit.target: 指定时间段，在该时间段后，SQL 工作流实例存储区将运行一个检测任务，来检测上一检测周期后持久性数据库中的任何可运行或可激活的工作流实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns the time interval.
trans-unit.target: 返回时间间隔。
